channel.title: golang on JB's blog
channel.description: Recent content in golang on JB's blog

item.title: This is the story of a blog
item.description: You, who are passing through this modest place, are probably wondering what you will find here… There are many subjects in this world that can be tackled with more or less success. I confess, a little shamefully, that this is only a piece of a secret garden, or rather a shared vegetable garden. Indeed, if your heart is in it, I would like to plant seeds, I would like to share with you some of my experiments, some of my thoughts.
